thread.title: Great Location. An oasis in the city.
thread.title_full: Great Location. An oasis in the city. - Review of 1 Hotel Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nellavern
title: Great Location. An oasis in the city.
text:
Nice romantic get-a-way location. Very interesting d√©cor with lots of live plants. Really like our corner room with view of the park. Special thanks to Alex and Christopher for their attentive care and wealth of information.
Looking forward to my next visit!
